duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain patient accounts and update personal financial and insurance information.
Optimize patient satisfaction, provider time, and treatment room utilization by assessing patient needs.
Schedule appointments and address customer/patient issues for effective resolution.
Provide timely feedback to the practice regarding service failures or patient concerns.
Consult with patients regarding their benefits, coverage, and financial options.
Greet patients and visitors to the office and provide a high level of customer service.
